channel.title: CVE Feed for MLflow -- MLflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MLflow -- MLflow

item.title: CVE-2024-37059|2024-06-06T14:56:50.566Z -- mlflow -- mlflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 0.5.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded PyTorch model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37059|2024-06-04T12:01:58.728Z -- mlflow -- mlflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 0.5.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded PyTorch model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.
